data.name: Blacklight: Retribution - Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Kick off your BLR experience with a solid loadout and over $35 worth of items. This pack includes weapons and equipment focused around an up-close and personal playstyle, with a fully-customized SMG and armor specced for defense, plus grenades and more for supporting charges. Additionally, you'll get a chunk of GP to unlock other items, plus an XP boost to help you level.

The Starter Pack unlocks the following for your Agent. All unlocks are permanent.
  • Fully-customized Downtowner SMG, built for close-range shots on the move.
  • Fully-customized HazMat Burst Pistol, inflicting toxic damage over time.
  • 2 gun modifications focused on mid-range firefights.
  • Slant X2 helmet and Guardian Warmonger chest armor, specialized in increasing your health and armor.
  • Toxic Grenade, creating a toxic cloud where you throw it.
  • EMP Grenade, blinding enemies.
  • 3000 Game Points (GP), allowing you to unlock more items.
  • 7 Day XP Boost, to help you level up faster.

To redeem your Key after purchase:

New Accounts
  • Go to https://register.perfectworld.com/bl_splash
  • Create your Account
  • Log into the game and create your character
  • Continue to Existing Accounts

    Existing Accounts
  • Go to blacklight.perfectworld.com/redeem
  • Enter your code and select your server and character, then click “Submit”

data.short_description: Kick off your BLR experience with a solid loadout and over $35 worth of items. This pack includes weapons and equipment focused around an up-close and personal playstyle, with a fully-customized SMG and armor specced for defense, plus grenades and more for supporting charges.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows® XP / Vista / Windows 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor:Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:256MB DX9 GPU (Geforce 8xxx or Radeon HD2xxx)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor:Quad-Core CPU
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:1GB+ DX11 GPU
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:8 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
